annotation.spannedText: It takes only 3 shots to protect yourself and your loved ones against hepatitis B for a lifetime

classMention.mentionClass: It takes only 3 shots to protect yourself and your loved ones against hepatitis B for a lifetime

annotation.spannedText: You cannot get hepatitis B from the vaccine

annotation.spannedText: This safe and effective vaccine is recommended for all infants at birth and for children up to 18 years

annotation.spannedText: The Hepatitis B vaccine is considered one of the safest and most effective vaccines ever made
